text: The men's moguls at the 2017 Asian Winter Games was held on 26 February 2017 at Bankei Ski Area in Sapporo, Japan. ==Schedule== All times are Japan Standard Time (UTC+09:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | rowspan=3|Sunday, 26 February 2017 || 11:15 || Qualification |- | 13:15 || Final 1 |- | 13:35 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final 2 |} ==Results== ;Legend *DSQ — Disqualified ===Qualification=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Athlete !width=70|Score |-bgcolor=ccffcc |1 |align=left| |85.21 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |2 |align=left| |82.80 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |3 |align=left| |81.71 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |4 |align=left| |81.38 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |5 |align=left| |81.15 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |6 |align=left| |79.16 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |7 |align=left| |79.09 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |8 |align=left| |78.13 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |9 |align=left| |77.86 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |10 |align=left| |76.81 |- |11 |align=left| |76.61 |- |12 |align=left| |66.50 |- |13 |align=left| |62.23 |- |14 |align=left| |58.47 |- |15 |align=left| |56.86 |- |16 |align=left| |55.90 |- |17 |align=left| |10.60 |- |18 |align=left| |1.13 |- |— |align=left| |DSQ |} ===Final 1=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Athlete !width=70|Score |-bgcolor=ccffcc |1 |align=left| |85.79 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |2 |align=left| |85.38 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |3 |align=left| |84.63 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |4 |align=left| |84.48 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |5 |align=left| |82.85 |-bgcolor=ccffcc |6 |align=left| |82.23 |- |7 |align=left| |82.10 |- |8 |align=left| |81.04 |- |9 |align=left| |73.32 |- |10 |align=left| |71.62 |} ===Final 2=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Athlete !width=70|Score |- | |align=left| |90.35 |- | |align=left| |88.55 |- | |align=left| |85.69 |- |4 |align=left| |84.06 |- |5 |align=left| |83.92 |- |6 |align=left| |80.87 |} ==References== ==External links== *Results at FIS website Men's moguls
